entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:27 p.m. EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.4Â°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. A few flurries or freezing rain beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Flurries with freezing rain early in the morning and with periods of ice pellets late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
